channel.title: Allstar-Scape // Can Hold Over 400 Players
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][b]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RZXOSDfhm5I[/b][/size] Was bored, can hold over 400 players apparently.
YOU CAN'T POST THIS, IT'S NOT YOURS! [b]MEH MEH MEH![/b]
[img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/317/zamagokxu6.png[/img] ___________________________________________ Allstar-Scape V1 [size=7pt]The first & original[/size] [b]Information[/b] Well I've [i]rerere[/i]registered on these forums countless times, so don't post things about me not knowing what I'm talking about, anyone can get this information if they really want to anyways so does it matter really? This was the Project Insanity/Deltascape two or so years ago, when the server status page was actually full of servers built by this base & majority of them were leeched, knowing this we still played them because even knowing this, we knew that it would be fun. Not some stupid little PvP server that makes you pay for all the decent items & areas. I guess I'm just a sucker for nostalgia. Irrelevant note, this was around the time of [url=http://www.easy-share.com/1910238821/Silabsoft.zip]The Silabsoft Client[/url], not the worst client nowadays. [b]Credits[/b] Mod Allstar [size=6pt]Any other contributers[/size] ___________________________________________ [u] [sup]http://www.mediafire.com/?ypbdyufex1dix2b[/sup] [/u] [b]Also a thread attachment, in case the external link dies, [b]you must [url=http://www.google.com.au/url?sa=t&source=web&cd=1&ved=0CBQQFjAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.moparisthebest.com%2Fsmf%2Findex.php%3Faction%3Dregister&ei=bGKDTPCwF8SecaKSqdAL&usg=AFQjCNG2Ml3HTc3nsUoeap-4gq5F33uMaw]register[/url] to download it as an attachment.[/b] [quote="JlStepper"][b] This server will crash with 10 players online. [/b][/quote] Small video I made, can have over 30 players doing things without lag. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9rqyT7WVgJ8 [b]Obviously I'm not the original creator.[/b]

Obviously I didn’t make this clear, my videos had only shown players online the server, I never said that this is what this can do normally, I did in fact say that the server should hold up to 30 players without to much issues within the AllStar-Scape Stability video as a caption. I apologize if I confused anyone, I did fight some replies but that’s because they were unfounded and idiotic. I have no other responses, thank you for a decent reply. I do enjoy your cleaned sources so I do have a respect for you.

item.title: Allstar-Scape // Can Hold Over 400 Players
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Alright. Break it down.

I am fed up with you incompetent fucktards talking the shit that is being said on this thread.

1: As Three One Seven said Czar came before Deltascape. In reality most servers including both Czar and Deltascape are based off of Winterlove(The first private server).

Some info about Winterlove:
Winterlove was originally written to show that private servers could be made and it was not intended to be used as it is.
Thus! Winterlove’s core is quite unstable and it is very inefficient.
Since then, some attempts have been made to improve Winterlove but what really needs to be done is the Hyperion approach. (Completely start from scratch)
This of course is impractical as the majority of the people doing private servers are just here for some entertainment over the holidays and not really here to learn Java/create something of worth.
There are about 10 people on this website with actual Java knowledge. (I do not claim to be one before anyone starts flaming me about it)

  1. Players connecting via local-host or not does in fact make a big difference. If the players are connected via local-host data transfer from client to server is instant. This means that any lag which could cause bugs in the server is lessened and thus less effective.

  2. The most I have ever seen an All-star server host (On a pretty pro comp too) with all the players being real, not over local-host and doing activities is about 30 - 50.

  3. Deltascape and the servers after it were all based on a more modified Winterlove which had improved stability and which is why they can handle >100 real players.

Also, I would like to make it clear, I love All-Star I think it is great fun to play etc. BUT I do not think that it is a good base for anyone who is serious about learning to code and having a good server. Sure it is fine for summerfags and the like. But if you really want to create a good server use Hyperion or one of the stickied servers.

If you cannot work them out I recommend Battlescape. (Cleaned of course).

EDIT: Also, on a personal note:

[quote=“imsokool22, post:46, topic:358761”]ok i just got 1 ? for you.
Q:is allstar delta?

only holy can answer this. answer and ill block you.[/quote]

This is just one of the immensely retarded things I have seen you spout. I want you to leave this website and then throw yourself off your balcony/banister or jump from a chandelier with a rope tied around your neck.

You are never going to get anywhere in life with intense ignorance and stupidity.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar-Scape // Can Hold Over 400 Players
item.dc:creator: @JlStepper JlStepper
item.description:
@JlStepper wrote:

[quote=“imsokool22, post:36, topic:358761”]@drachtpkz. first this isnt czar its delta(allstarscape). plus this isnt his.
third delta sucks overall.
@three over seven
when they guy said “i cant find no-ip” he meant to change ip to localhost, not to host it.
second, get some knowledge, not everybody likes allstar, since its a very crappy base with a shitty login screen.
third, grow up. if someone argues with you just get over,dont argue back it makes u immature.Unless ur doing it with a friend offline then no body will know about it. if online they ppl will start hating you.
finally, too many allstars have been posted, plus this does NOT have syi. so if you make a server someone could crash it and use a proxy to change ip. Also they will use syipkpker which is NOT blocked on here, you change name so if they mute the syi’ers they cna change name or change ip.
third, switch to battlescape or delta scape. they are better and more sophisticated.Allstar = shitty. delta =ok. clean delta = little better. battlescape = very good. Also, i would choose a STABLE source to host. just because it has no lag on your ip doesnt mean other ppl won’t lag. As on localhost, it just is not sending through the internet, and using udp. When online, it uses udp. ok ill explain.

TCP means it only sends out and doesnt bring back in. UDP is when it sends out and brings back. When you server is connect’d through the internet people can connect and the lag mostly depends on your upload and download speed. Sometimes, mysql can help with lag. So if your UL and DL speed are very bad you need a vps. A vps is a Virtual Private server. A VPS runs off a online connecting, with greater specs. You can get one by searching it on google.com. Most servers with vps’ have very little lag and are very good. There are some on vps that are shitty sources, which are meant to be hosted on no-ip online rather then a vps.

YOU"VE JUST BEEN OUT OWN’d.

NOTE: i know this post was long it was to tell you why u SHOULDN’T be posting this server.

EoD[/quote]

/Facepalm.

Read full topic
